channel.title: Projects on aloosefish
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on aloosefish

item.title: Ideas
item.description: Here are some personal projects I am interested in working on, in no particular order: The Weirdest Things Analyze content tags for front-page news stories of major national newspapers to find the most unusual stories See how or if the subject matter has changed over a period of several years Sans Swagger Use a neural network to create a rap lyric generator Applications of agent-based modeling in financial portfolio analysis Segregation study Use US Census data to rate tracts according to levels of ethnic and racial diversity As well as incomes, noting in Portland MSA the possible impact of professional athletesâ€™ salaries on mean incomes of blacks.

item.title: The Best and Worst Neighborhoods in Portland
item.description: This analysis was done for an assignment in the GEOG488 GIS1 course at Portland State University. The geospatial data used in this project is both very large (about 1.6 GB) and not freely distributable. Therefore the resulting report it is presented as a pdf.
